args.natural_language_statement: Let {a_k}_{k=1}^\infty be an enumeration of the rational numbers (so a : ℕ → ℚ). Define f_n(x) := x / (1 + (n x)^2) for x ∈ ℝ and g_n(x) := \sum_{k=1}^n 2^{-k} f_n(x - a_k). Show that g_n → 0 uniformly on ℝ. Translate to Lean4 (import Mathlib) and end the theorem with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators
open Filter

/-- Let aq : ℕ → ℚ be an enumeration of the rationals. Define f_n(x) := x / (1 + (n x)^2)
and g_n(x) := ∑_{k=1}^n 2^{-k} f_n(x - a_k) where a_k = aq k (coerced to ℝ). -/
variable (aq : ℕ → ℚ)

noncomputable def f (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ := x / (1 + (n * x) ^ 2)

noncomputable def g (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ :=
  ∑ k in Finset.range n, (1 / 2 : ℝ) ^ (k + 1) * f aq n (x - (aq (k + 1) : ℝ))

theorem g_tends_to_zero_uniformly : TendstoUniformlyOn (g aq) (fun _ => 0) atTop (Set.univ : Set ℝ) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators
open Filter
open Set

section g_sequence

variable (aq : ℕ → ℚ)

noncomputable def f (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ := x / (1 + (n * x) ^ 2)

noncomputable def g (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ :=
  ∑ k in Finset.range n, (1 / 2 : ℝ) ^ (k + 1) * f aq n (x - (aq (k + 1) : ℝ))

theorem g_tends_to_zero_uniformly : TendstoUniformlyOn (fun n => g aq n) (fun _ => 0) atTop (univ : Set ℝ) := by sorry

end g_sequence

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators
open Filter
open Set

section g_sequence

variable (aq : ℕ → ℚ)

noncomputable def f (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ := x / (1 + (n * x) ^ 2)

noncomputable def g (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ :=
  Finset.sum (Finset.range n) fun k => (1 / 2 : ℝ) ^ (k + 1) * f n (x - (aq (k + 1) : ℝ))

theorem g_tends_to_zero_uniformly : TendstoUniformlyOn (fun n => g n) (fun _ => 0) atTop (univ : Set ℝ) := by sorry

end g_sequence

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators
open Filter
open Set

section g_sequence

variable (aq : ℕ → ℚ)

noncomputable def f (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ := x / (1 + (n * x) ^ 2)

noncomputable def g (n : ℕ) (x : ℝ) : ℝ :=
  Finset.sum (Finset.range n) fun k => (1 / 2 : ℝ) ^ (k + 1) * f n (x - (aq (k + 1) : ℝ))

theorem g_tends_to_zero_uniformly : TendstoUniformly (fun n => g n) (fun _ => 0) atTop := by sorry

end g_sequence
